data.title: Bodyweight Squat
instruction: Keep your chest up and back straight
Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair
Push through your heels to stand back up
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions

data.title: Wall Squat
instruction: Stand with your back against a wall
Slide down into a squat until your knees are at a 90-degree angle
Hold the position while keeping your back flat against the wall
Push through your heels to stand back up
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions

data.title: Sumo Squat
instruction: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointed out
Lower your hips straight down while keeping your chest up
Push through your heels to return to standing
Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions
